title: Ted Cruz’s Attempt At Honoring Martin Luther King’s ‘I Have A Dream’ Speech Backfires
text:
Get the Rev. Dr. King’d name out of your race baiting pathological lying mouth.

You protect the most racist POTUS in a modern US history, you are a coward and you will be remembered like Jesse Helms, Strom Thurman, Jeff Sessions as failed racist on the wrong side of history.
